item.title: 一个gitlab ci文件
item.description: 一个golang项目典型的gitlab ci文件 image: golang:latest before_script: - export GOPROXY=https://goproxy.io,direct stages: - build - release - note build: stage: build script: - go build -o dt-release artifacts: paths: - .
